Source.Name: argon2
Source.Summary: The password hash Argon2, winner of PHC
Source.Description: Argon2 is a password-hashing function that summarizes the state of the art in the design of memory-hard functions and can be used to hash passwords for credential storage, key derivation, or other applications.
